item.title: Charles add a quote by Kate Bornstein
item.description: "I have this idea that every time we discover that the names we're being called are somehow keeping us less than free, we need to come up with new names for ourselves, and that the names we give ourselves must no longer reflect a fear of being labeled outsiders, must no longer bind us to a system that would rather see us dead." -- Kate Bornstein

item.title: Charles add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "Uglier than death backin' outta the outhouse readin' mad magazine and crazy as a football bat." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Charles add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "You have waged bitter and undeclared war upon the green, gutting the rain forests, mile after mile, day after day, but know this: the war has come home! It is man's turn to embrace the scythe." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Charles add a quote by Debra Ginsberg
item.description: "Hey, stronzo, che cazzo fai?" Mario demands." -- Debra Ginsberg

item.title: Charles add a quote by Julia Serano
item.description: "Sexism occurs when we assume that some people are less valid or natural than others because of their sex, gender, or sexuality; it occurs when we project our own expectations and assumptions about sex, gender, and sexuality onto other people, and police their behaviors accordingly; it occurs when we reduce another person to their sex, gender, or sexuality rather than seeing them as a whole, legitimate person. That is sexism. And a person is a legitimate feminist when they have made a commitment to challenging sexist double standards wherever and whenever they arise. An individual's personal style, mannerisms, identity, consensual sexual partners, and live choices simply shouldn't factor into it." -- Julia Serano

item.title: Charles add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "...but my mom's going to hate being hated. she's a skinny beautiful lady with perfect hair; she's just not equipped to deal with hate." -- Chuck Palahniuk
